example: We stood for a few moments, admiring the view.
The designs for the new mosque have attracted widespread criticism.
Long hair is back in fashion for men.
[ + speech ] To every question, he responded: "I don't know."
There has been a significant increase in the number of women students in recent years.
She hired a lawyer who specializes in divorce cases

meaning: sự phân bổ theo tính chất
example: The colors of the spectrum - red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet - can be seen in a rainbow.
